questions.question: What is the dominant color of the visible portion of the product's exterior?
What is the overall shape of the product, when viewed from the side?
What appears to be the primary material composing the majority of the product?
What color is the visible stripe along the side of the product?
What is the apparent texture of the main body of the product?
What is the implied function or use of this object, based on its shape and material?
Does the item display any noticeable patterns or designs on its main surface?
Is there any visible stitching or seams present on the object's exterior?
Is there a distinct contrast between the colors observed in the product?
Judging by the image, what is the approximate length of this object?
What seems to be the consistency of the filling material inside the product?
Is the shape of the item uniform or does it have visible irregularities?
What is the apparent thickness or width of the product at its widest point?
Describe the visible surface finish of the teal colored section.
Based on visual observation, would you describe the object as pliable or rigid?
